title: Upgrading App (Retaining Feature Access/Settings)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the current Store build version installed from HockeyApp
And the user has logged in with an entitled account
And the user has set Favorite Team(s)
custom_steps:
When the user overwrites the app with the latest Test Build
And launches the app
custom_expected:
Then the user's login information will be retained
And the user's feature access will be retained
And the user's Favorite Teams will be retained

title: Video Launch Points
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed the app
and navigate to the areas of the app where video highlights are available
custom_steps: When the user attempts to play video from the following sections:

custom_steps_separated.content: Video section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the highlight opens in Full Screen mode
And the highlight can be watched in it's entirety

custom_steps_separated.content: Team Page, Videos
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the highlight opens in Full Screen mode
And the highlight can be watched in it's entirety

title: News Launch Points
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has MiLB First Pitch installed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  the user access News from the Main Nav
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the News index loads
and user is able to switch between classes and have the corresponding class news index load

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on an article from the class news index
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the corresponding article loads

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on Teams Page
and selects News link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the News index loads for the corresponding team
and user is able to to scroll on the page without issues

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on an article from the team news index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the corresponding article loads
and user is able to scroll on the page without issues

title: MiLB.tv
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on MiLB First Pitch
and is logged in with MiLB.TV Premium user

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user attempts to watch a Live MiLB.tv feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is granted access and can watch the feed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user attempts to watch an Archive MiLB.tv feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is granted access and can watch the feed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is watching an MiLB.TV feed and stops the feed
AND from the EPG the user taps on another game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Media Framework check appears
and the user is let into the other feed

title: 10 AM Scoreboard Flip
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a device with First Pitch
custom_steps:
When the user opens First Pitch
and taps on Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: when the device date is current date before 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Scoreboard will show the previous day's games

custom_steps_separated.content: when the device date is current date after 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Scoreboard will show the current day's games

title: Data Updates
custom_preconds: Given a user has First Pitch installed
custom_steps:
When a user is observing a live game
or a strung game in QA
custom_expected: Then the data will update accordingly

custom_steps_separated.content: on the Team Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Inning, States, Linescore including RHE, Basepaths, Count, Outs

Below Linescore:
Pitcher stats [P]: ( , ERA) & Batter stats [AB]: ( , AVG)

custom_steps_separated.content: on the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
On Game Cell:
Score, Inning, States, Basepaths, Count, Outs

Below Game Cell:
Pitcher stats [P]: ( , ERA) & Batter stats [AB]: ( , AVG)

title: Gameday - Switching Games
custom_preconds:
Given a user is in Gameday
and switches between games on the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches between a game in preview and another game in preview
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Game Preview view and none of the previous games information is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches between a game in preview and another game in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Live game view and none of the previous games information is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches between a game in preview and another game in final
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Wrap game view and none of the previous games information is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches between a live game and a game in preview
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Game Preview and none of the previous games information is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches between a live game and another live game
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Live game view and none of the previous games information is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches between a live game and game in final
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Wrap game view and none of the previous games information is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches between a final game and a game in preview
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Game Preview and none of the previous games information is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches between a final game and a game in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Live game view and none of the previous games information is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and switches final game and a game in final
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the new game data loads in the Wrap game view and none of the previous games information is displayed

title: General App UX
custom_preconds: Given a user has MiLB First Pitch is installed
custom_steps: When a user has the app open

custom_steps_separated.content: swiping between games on the Team Page Schedule/Scores module
custom_steps_separated.expected: is smooth and no blinking and all data loads

custom_steps_separated.content: swiping vertically on the Team Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: is smooth and no blinking and all data loads

custom_steps_separated.content: swiping between games on the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: is smooth and no blinking and all data loads

custom_steps_separated.content: swiping vertically on the News index
custom_steps_separated.expected: is smooth and no blinking and all data loads

custom_steps_separated.content: swiping between News articles
custom_steps_separated.expected: is smooth and no blinking and all data loads
